original_text: He will come and attack Egypt, bringing death to those destined for death, captivity to those destined for captivity, and the sword to those destined for the sword.
korean_text: 그가 와서 애굽 땅을 치고 죽일 자는 죽이고 사로잡을 자는 사로잡고 칼로 칠 자는 칼로 칠 것이라

sentences.original_text: He will come and attack Egypt
bringing death to those destined for death
captivity to those destined for captivity
sentences.korean_translation: 포로가 될 자들에게는 포로 생활을 가져오며

sentences.original_text: and the sword to those destined for the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 칼을 맞을 자들에게는 칼을 가져올 것이다
